Pecinka, A, Dinh, HQ, Baubec, T, et al. Epigenetic regulation of repetitive elements is attenuated by prolonged heat stress in Arabidopsis. Plant Cell. 2010; 22(9): 3118–3129. PMID: 20876829
Zitnik, M, Nguyen, F, Wang, B, et al. Machine learning for integrating data in biology and medicine: principles, practice, and opportunities. Inf Fusion. 2019; 50: 71–91. PMID: 30467459
Schmied, C, Steinbach, P, Pietzsch, T, et al. An automated workflow for parallel processing of large multiview SPIM recordings. Bioinformatics. 2016; 32(7): 1112–1114. PMID: 26628585
Savadel, SD, Bass, HW. Take a look at plant DNA replication: recent insights and new questions. Plant Signal Behav. 2017; 12(4): e1311437. PMID: 28375043
